title: Understanding Font Color Change
text: To change the font color of a cell in a spreadsheet, you need to access the font color options. This is usually found in the toolbar or menu options.

title: Locating the Font Color Option
text: Look for an icon or menu option that resembles a paintbrush or a letter with a color underneath it. This is typically the font color option.

hintAnswer: Click on a cell, then click font color and choose your theme color
title: Steps to Change Font Color
text: First, click on the cell you want to change. Then, find the font color option in the toolbar and select your desired color.
choices: Click on a cell, then click font color and choose your theme color
Click on a cell, then click font color
Click on a cell, then enter the name of the color you want.
